name: Pinax
description:
Group 7: Ben Hou, Mateo Castro, Hongyi Zheng

Take control of a space fighter as you go through enemies and avoid their projectiles. Hold still to unleash a charged attack and deal massive damage.

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys

Nobody said this was gonna be easy. (don't tell the others but pressing z in the main menu will give you easy mode).

BGM:

Art of silence by uniq

https://soundcloud.com/uniqofficial/
